Alabama knows the opioid crisis all too well.
 
In 2018, I backed successful bipartisan opioid legislation that would:

✔️Improve federal coordination
✔️Increase access to treatment
✔️Invest in opioid alternatives
✔️Stop synthetic drugs coming into the US https://tinyurl.com/y42wfxfl

For two decades, Alabama has been fighting the unfair Medicare reimbursement rate and received just 67% of the national average—which has hurt hospitals across Alabama. 

I am grateful that after meeting with @SeemaCMS, she heard our concerns and took action. pic.twitter.com/8IfP2s1ZaN

I’m very happy that following our meeting last year with @SeemaCMS, the unfair Medicare Wage Index issue got on her radar and she took action—thank you! This will be a huge help for Alabama’s struggling hospitals. @CMSGov
 https://www.jones.senate.gov/newsroom/press-releases/senator-doug-jones-final-medicare-wage-index-rule-will-provide-long-overdue-relief-for-struggling-alabama-hospitals …
